reviewText:
"Forsaking the right way, they have gone astray. They have followed the way of Balaam, the son of Beor, who loved gain from wrongdoing"
 2 Peter 2:15

The video is filled with false testimonies and lies about the lives of the people portrait.  They are not accurate and do not represent the truth.  The Gospel does not need inflated testimonies that are simply not true.  Just preach the truth of the Gospel and let God do his sovereign work.
This video is so full of truth. I'm so happy I ordered it.
This video is so full of truth. I'm so happy I ordered it.
Excellent DVD but it was missing the leaders guide.
Wonderfully explained, with great examples from firsthand experiences.

This is an excellent resource for small groups. I'd like to see our whole church use it to re-ignite prayer as the essential element in the church. Every pastor should use it as a guide for their prayer life.
